channel.title: CVE Feed for Meow Apps -- Media File Renamer – Auto & Manual Rename (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Meow Apps -- Media File Renamer – Auto & Manual Rename (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2021-36850|2024-08-04T01:01:59.839Z -- meow%20apps -- media%20file%20renamer%20%E2%80%93%20auto%20%26%20manual%20rename%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WordPress Media File Renamer – Auto & Manual Rename plugin (versions <= 5.1.9). Affected parameters "post_title", "filename", "lock". This allows changing the uploaded media title, media file name, and media locking state.
